#Comparing OLS to ridge
```{r}
compare_ols_ridge <- function(responses, predictors, lambda=1){
  n_obs <- dim(GenCont)[1]
  proportion_split = 0.5
  train_index <- sample(1:n_obs, round(n_obs * proportion_split))
  y = GenCont$Phenotypes
  x = as.matrix(GenCont[setdiff(colnames(GenCont), "lpsa")])
  xtr = x[train_index,]
  xte = x[-train_index,]
  ytr = y[train_index]
  yte = y[-train_index]
  ols = lm(ytr ~ xtr)
  lasso = cv.glmnet(xtr,ytr, alpha = 1)
  ridge = cv.glmnet(xtr, ytr, alpha = 0)
  y_hat_old = cbind(rep(1,n_obs ~ length(train_index)), xte) %*% coef(ols)
  y_hat_lasso = predict(lasso, xte)
  y_hat_ridge = predict(ridge, xte)
  ## compare
  sum((yte - y_hat_ols)^2)
  sum((yte - y_hat_lasso)^2)
  sum((yte - y_hat_ridge)^2)

}

Shrink_results = 1
```
